title: Inicio-XAMPP
description: Visual and modern dashboard to manage local projects when changing the `htdocs` path in XAMPP. It replaces Apache's basic listing with an attractive and functional interface.

title: VentaEnterprise
description: Desktop application developed in Python that facilitates comprehensive sales and inventory management for businesses. With an intuitive and modern interface.

title: Dark Bot
description: Intelligent web chatbot developed with Flask that answers questions based on a database of Q&A stored in JSON files. With a modern and responsive dark-themed interface, it offers a natural and fluid conversation experience.
